term.title: resonance absorption technique

item.text: The monitoring of atoms or radicals generated in the gas phase by observing the attenuation of the radiation from a lamp emitting the characteristic resonance radiation of the observed species.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2223. 'Glossary of terms used in photochemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2271 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122223)
